meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects

Class ShipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects.ShipController

  • public class ShipController
extends java.lang.Object
    Ship controller for managing ships. ShipController creates new Ships and SpaceFighter. ShipController is also used for binding Projectiles to specific ships and weapons.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

      Creates new ship with a BasicGun and BasicProjectile.

    • Method Detail

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip()
        Creates new ship with a BasicGun and BasicProjectile.
        Returns:
        Ship

      • getSpaceFighter

        public SpaceFighter getSpaceFighter()
        Creates a more advanced new ship. SpaceFighter will have a BasicGun and BasicProjectile.
        Returns:
        SpaceFighter

      • bindProjectile

        public void bindProjectile(Ship ship,
                           Projectile.ProjectileType projectileType)
        Bind projectile to the ship's main weapon.
        Parameters:
        ship - that's going to have a new ProjectileType like ProjectileType.PLASMA_PROJECTILE
        projectileType - that's going to be binded to the ship's main weapon

      • bindProjectile

        public void bindProjectile(Weapon weapon,
                           Projectile.ProjectileType projectileType)
        Bind projectile to the specific weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - that's going to have a new ProjectileType like ProjectileType.PLASMA_PROJECTILE
        projectileType - that's going to be binded to the specific Weapon

      • changeWeapon

        public void changeWeapon(Ship ship)
        Change to the next weapon from specific ship. Goes through all the different ProjectileTypes that are in the ship and changes to the next one.
        Parameters:
        ship - that's going to change its weapon
